title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files in the MRU (Most Recently Used) list in the File menu do not persist between sessions.
EB: The files in the MRU list should be saved and available when the application is reopened.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Open multiple files.
3. Check the File menu MRU list.
4. Close the application.
5. Reopen the application.
6. Check the File menu MRU list again.
Expected result: The MRU list should retain the previously opened files across sessions.
